review:
Dr Sai Kiran is really a good and reliable physician. 
He give his patients proper time and listen to his patients.
Thanks

I have visited this clinic multiple times, and all the doctors (including Dr. Sai Kiran) are very friendly and helpful, but the clinic processes and management cause a lot of inconvenience. 
1. There is no appointment system, so even if you book a slot through practo, you'd still have to wait (and this information is not provided before hand)
2. Even after taking a walk-in appointment, there is no proper system of queing patients to doctors in the correct order. As a patient, you need to be a bit more proactive and less generous, otherwise you'll probably end up waiting for a lot more time than required.

But again, I was really satisfied with the doctors there, so that's why I'd still recommend this place and specifically Dr. Sai Kiran.

Had cold, cough, fever last week and visited Dr Sai Kiran, he was very kind to me, he had all the time to listen to my complaints. His medication list was perfect and I became normal in few days. I strongly recommend him. * *** ****** *** ** ** *** **** ********* ********* ** ******** *****

** *** ***** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** We were lucky to visit him at his clinic at the right time. He is very humble and will make you feel comfortable. very friendly and helpful doctor. would really recommend,Recommended for everyone with heart problems, ** **** *** ********* *********** *********.Thanks a lot sir.

Dr. Sai Kiran listens to the patient's grievances very carefully. I had a pain in my chest around my heart I consulted him at Neo Asian and half of problem disappeared just after meeting him.He told me that I had anxiety issue and gave some medicine, post to that everything was fine.We need more doctors like him

Dr Sai Kiran has been very helpful and supportive for proper and timely treatment and diagnosis for any lifestyle diseases in my family . 

His patience , attention to details and willingness to cure sets him a class apart . 

I would recommend Dr Sai to anyone who wants to restart their fitness journey and wants to improve their cardiovascular health through lifestyle changes

For the past six years, I've been seeing Dr. Sai Kiran Thipparthi. He pays close attention to patients' problems, conducts thorough investigations, *** ** **** ************** He remembers the medical histories of his patients and treats them accordingly. He prescribes necessary medications(only required) and explains them thoroughly. Mostly, he makes us feel at ease and gives us confidence in the treatment. We now consider him a family doctor for our entire family.

My wife had symptoms of Asthama and recurring cough from past 6 months, during this period we changed several doctors and medicines as well. 
Dr. Sai Kiran could able to diagnose well my wife and suggested tests on the basis of which he prescribed correct medicines by which my wife got cured now and she is out of Asthama symtomes. I would be thankful to him. 

Dr. Sai Kiran is very experienced and talented.
I confidently recommend to others to get consultation from Dr. Sai Kiran. 
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Thipparthi is of a pleasurable disposition. You get a lot of confidence talking to him. The best thing about him is that he decides the line of treatment in consultation with the patient.
I have been visiting him since I came to a new city Hyderabad. ** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***** When he hold my pulse I already recovery my illness.
